modName: Several starting game saves to get you past the Dovahkiin Intro
summary: This add several save game files that allow you to choose where you start in the story line, all the way from choosing Imperials or Stormcloaks to Completing the Jurgen Windcaller Quest and becoming the official Dovahkiin.
descriptionHtml:
This add several save game files that allow you to choose where you start in the story line, all the way from choosing Imperials or Stormcloaks to Completing the Jurgen Windcaller Quest and becoming the official Dovahkiin.

Just add 1 of the files to:
...Libraries/Documents/My Games/Skyrim/Saves
No mods required
Default Nord look

To change the look hit the '~' (Tilde Key) and then type "showracemenu" and you can change the look to however you want.

Save 80:
Choose between the Imperials and Stormcloaks.

Save 82:
Turned in the Dragonstone, Stormcloak but can still go Imperial, After Bleak Falls but 
before 1st dragon kill.

Save 83:
After Western Watchtower, is thane, owns breezehome w/o upgrades, all the items found are 
in bedroom chest.

Save 84:
Learned Whirlwind Sprint, Need to retrieve Windcallers Horn.

Save 85:
Returned Windcaller's Horn, is now official Dragonborn, Knows Fus-Ro-Dah, is located in 
Breezehome with all the items found in the bedroom chest, has Lydia as Follower

These saves are mainly for me for when I wipe my OS in a day or two, but use as you please.
author: iRageGGB
